title: camera_sensor test failed on ati gpu with segfault

content.raw:
[camera_sensor test failure](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-ati/lastCompletedBuild/consoleText)

with context
~~~
test 1
      Start  1: camera_sensor

1: Test command: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-ati/build/test/regression/camera_sensor "--gtest_output=xml:/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-ati/build/test_results/camera_sensor.xml"
1: Test timeout computed to be: 240
1: [==========] Running 4 tests from 1 test case.

1: [----------] 4 tests from CameraSensor

1: [1;31mError [camera_sensor.cc:51][0m No rendering engine, unable to run camera test
1: [       OK ] CameraSensor.CheckThrottle (1279 ms)
1: [ RUN      ] CameraSensor.UnlimitedTest
1: Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 1.3.0
1: Copyright (C) 2012 Nate Koenig, John Hsu, and contributors.

1: http://gazebosim.org

1: [1;31mError [RenderEngine.cc:609][0m Can't open display: :0
1: [1;33mWarning [RenderEngine.cc:87][0m Unable to create X window. Rendering will be disabled
1: [1;31mError [camera_sensor.cc:99][0m No rendering engine, unable to run camera test
 1/32 Test  #1: camera_sensor ....................***Exception: SegFault  4.98 sec
